scripts.start: DOCKER_BUILDKIT=0 docker build -t jodit-connector . && docker run -t -i -p 80:80 jodit-connector
scripts.newversion: composer upgrade && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run github
scripts.github: git add --all  && git commit -m "New version $npm_package_version. Read more https://github.com/xdan/jodit-connectors/ " && git tag $npm_package_version && git push --tags origin HEAD:master
